title: FS: T206 McGraw Glove at Hip Old Mill (PSA, Pop 3)
author: JoeC1991

posts.post_title: FS: T206 McGraw Glove at Hip Old Mill (PSA, Pop 3)
posts.post_content:
Rare combo. Asking $800. Only three graded by PSA, so this would be #4. Maybe a 1, probably a 1MK. A nicer looking PSA 1 recently sold at Heritage for $2160. 

[url]https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball/1909-11-t206-old-mill-john-mcgraw-glove-at-hip-psa-poor-1-only-three-confirmed-old-mill-backs-/a/50033-57567.s?ic4=GalleryView-Thumbnail-071515[/url]
This card is sold, pending payment.
